title: Chat not working and gameplay

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
That is my chat window at the bottom, just a blue bar. Reinstalled the entire game delete all old files, even installed it on a different drive, chat still shows up blue as it just did in this picture. 
Also I've been using left click to move for a very long time, is that not the common practice because I was in an aram and suddenly could not move with the left click anymore and had to right click, is that normal? Like is the default right click to move?

replies.body:
It seems like your configuration settings might be messed up.  Though you reinstalled, your settings are still sync'd to our servers.  Performing a config reset might help with this:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

You can also swap your attack and move buttons as well in-game now.  While in-game, select Hotkeys in the options menu and scroll all the way to to bottom.  I hope that helps!

So I did that and it still does not work, but further. When I try to bind MB1 it will not bind to anything.  I have a logitech performance mx mouse. So I just downloaded the software for the mouse, and even swapping the mouse buttons does not work. Yet the game clearly recognized the mouse button one, because I can upgrade abilities, and single click buy shop items, and move across the map. 

This happened about 8 months ago,something like that, I had to force bind mouse button one, using the config settings file by typing it in... 

I am going to try that now, but that still means there is a problem, and my chat still is not working. I also just did a game repair and nothing changed. I even reset defaults. So I guess I'll go edit the config file.
I did the binding from the config  it worked my chat still does not pop up, which is sad. However now if i click the hud, my character moves to where the cursor is.
